item.title: Badges
item.description: InfluxData Badges Through our partnership with Credly, InfluxData is offering digital credentials for community members and partners. These digital badges can be shared on their social networks, resumes, websites or email. InfluxDB University Learning Complete InfluxDB Community InfluxData Partner Reseller InfluxData Partners

item.title: Company Downloads
item.description: Company Downloads DOs Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is not busy If placing the logo over a busy image, darken or lighten the image using brand colors to ensure proper contrast DON'Ts Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol without special permission Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.

item.title: Logo Colors
item.description: Logo Colors Mono Color Logo Sometimes, often due to production costs, only one color of ink is available and so the logo must be reproduced using only one color. In this scenario, the logo, logomark or wordmark must be used following the convention of using a light color type on a dark background or in a dark color type on a light background. Mono Color Logo — Outlined Kubo Sometimes, often due to production costs, only one color of ink is available and so the logo must be reproduced using only one color.

item.title: Logo Usage Guidelines
item.description: Logo Construction The logo contains the logomark and the wordmark. Both elements have been exactly positioned and proportionally fine-tuned. Clearspace It's important to maintain proper spacing around the logo to avoid overcrowding. Also, the use of whitespace keeps the brand feeling clean. Minimum Size When significantly reduced, the logo will become illegible. These are the pixel size units we recommend staying within to preserve quality of the logo.

item.title: Story
item.description: How The Cuboctahedron Came To Be: The Story Of Our Visual Journey From InfluxDB to InfluxData What began as InfluxDB will become InfluxData; going from product to platform. InfluxDB will become one of four products known collectively as the "TICK Stack". This transition of the company is the inception our efforts. Our goals:We want the logo to feel like a platform while maintaining its own unique identity.

item.title: Code Typeface
item.description: Font used for code blocks Roboto Mono is a monospaced addition to the Roboto type family. Like the other members of the Roboto family, the fonts are optimized for readability on screens across a wide variety of devices and reading environments. While the monospaced version is related to its variable width cousin, it doesn’t hesitate to change forms to better fit the constraints of a monospaced environment.

item.title: Flux Language
item.description: Flux Language About Flux is a standalone data scripting and query language that increases productivity and code reuse. Flux is optimized for ETL, monitoring, and alerting, with an inline planner and optimizer. Flux is the result of the open source community driving innovation with time series data. DOs Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is not busy If placing the logo over a busy image, darken or lighten the image using brand colors to ensure proper contrast DON'Ts Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol without special permission Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.

item.title: Primary Typeface
item.description: Typography Proxima Nova is safe to use for both print and web. All design assets should be created using this font. Headlines and Body Text https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/proxima-nova Designed by: Mark Simonson and first released through FontHaus in 1994. Fun fact: Proxima Nova was originally named Zanzibar. Proxima Nova Characters abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ‘ ? ’ “ ! ” ( % ) [ # ] { @ } / & \ ® © $ € £ ¥ ¢ : ; , .

item.title: Company Profile
item.description: InfluxData Boilerplate InfluxData in 100 Words InfluxData is the creator of InfluxDB, the leading time series platform. More than 1,900 customers use InfluxDB to collect, store, and analyze all time series data at any scale. Developers can query and analyze their time-stamped data in real-time to discover, interpret, and share new insights to gain a competitive edge. InfluxData is a remote-first company with a globally distributed workforce.

item.title: Mascots
item.description: InfluxData Mascots We make use of animal mascots to add more personality to the brand. They are not the official representations of our products or The TICK Stack as a whole. The mascots are primarily used in promotional material such as stickers and merchandise. Each product has an associated animal that uses the same starting character (Except Chronograf). Telegraf Tiger InfluxDB I'iwi Chronograf Giraffe Kapacitor Koala Outreach Club Octopus Downloads Color + Transparent Background Mascot Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-24 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-24 400x295 Chronograf PNG-24 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-24 280x380 Outreach PNG-24 249x400 Color + White Background Mascot Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-8 / JPG 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-8 / JPG 400x295 Chronograf PNG-8 / JPG 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-8 / JPG 280x380 Outreach PNG-8 / JPG 249x400
